title: Programmable Low-Ohm Meter
subtitle: Precision resistance measurements from 0.001mΩ to 1.9999MΩ

paragraphs: The WK 3100 is a Programmable Low-Ohm Meter designed to offer precise resistance measurements across a wide range, from 0.001mΩ to 1.9999MΩ. Its advanced features and high-speed capabilities make it ideal for use in automation systems and various testing environments, ensuring accurate component evaluation with minimal temperature influence.

applications: Electronics manufacturing and quality control environments requiring precise resistance measurement
Testing environments where high speed and accurate component analysis are critical
Laboratories and R&D centers needing versatile, reliable, and accurate testing equipment for component characterization

features.title: Broad Measurement Range
features.description: Capable of measuring resistance from 0.001mΩ to 1.9999MΩ, ensuring flexibility in handling a wide array of components

features.title: High Accuracy
features.description: Provides excellent accuracy levels of ±0.1% of the reading, enhancing the reliability of test results

features.title: Advanced Measurement Modes
features.description: Offers Level and Pulse measurement modes, with Pulse Mode reducing temperature influence during tests

features.title: Fast Testing Capability
features.description: Equipped with a high-speed Fast Analog-to-Digital Converter (FADC), achieving maximum test speeds of up to 14ms to accelerate testing processes

features.title: Comprehensive Display and Controls
features.description: Features a 240 x 64 graphic LCD display for clear, detailed readouts and easy navigation through test settings

features.title: Versatile Trigger and Test Modes
features.description: Supports both internal and external triggering, with auto or manual ranging and zeroing calibration for enhanced precision

features.title: Comprehensive Sorting and Comparing Functions
features.description: Includes BIN Sorting and HI/LOW limit comparator functions to facilitate component sorting and quality control assessments

features.title: Connectivity Options
features.description: Comes with RS232 and HANDLER combinatorial interfaces, facilitating integration with other systems

specifications.heading: Level Mode Specifications
list: 20 mΩ range: 0.000 ~ 19.999, 0.001mΩ resolution, 1A dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
200 mΩ range: 0.00 ~ 199.99, 0.01mΩ resolution, 100mA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
2Ω range: 0.0000 ~ 19.999, 0.0001Ω resolution, 100mA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
20 Ω range: 0.000 ~ 19.999, 0.001Ω resolution, 10mA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
20 Ω range (high): 0.000 ~ 10.000, 0.01Ω resolution, 1mA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
2 kΩ range: 0.0000 ~ 1.9999, 0.0001kΩ resolution, 1mA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
20 kΩ range: 0.000 ~ 19.999, 0.001kΩ resolution, 100µA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
200 kΩ range: 0.00 ~ 199.99, 0.01kΩ resolution, 10µA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy
2 MΩ range: 0.0000 ~ 1.9999, 0.0001MΩ resolution, 1µA dc current, ±(0.1% of reading + 5 digits) accuracy

specifications.heading: Pulse Mode Specifications
list: 20 mΩ range: 0.000 ~ 19.999, 0.001mΩ resolution, ±50mA current, ±(0.5% of reading + 10 digits) accuracy
200 mΩ range: 0.00 ~ 199.99, 0.01mΩ resolution, ±50mA current, ±(0.5% of reading + 10 digits) accuracy
2Ω range: 0.0000 ~ 1.9999, 0.0001Ω resolution, ±50mA current, ±(0.2% of reading + 10 digits) accuracy

specifications.heading: Battery Backup
content: Measurement status: Measure range, Comparator setting

specifications.heading: Comparator
content: HI/LO: Judgment comparator STD value setting, Hi/Low Limit setting, Pass/Fail Judgment, Alarm Indicate
BIN sorting: Sorting comparator Reference value & HI-LO Limits setting by BIN NO. or STEPS mode, Limit of DCR Value, 8 BIN for sorting & BIN SUM count

specifications.heading: Accessories
content: Test clips, Power cord, Operation manual, Certificate of calibration
